channel.title: Lead Full Stack Javascript Developer – permanent or contract. – Remote work
channel.description:
Lead Full Stack Javascript Developer – permanent or contract. – Remote work
Bitbay is actively looking to add to its already established development team by adding a Senior / Lead node.js dev Full stack developer to join an existing team in the development of mobile apps.
The successful developer /Analyst Programmer/Software Engineer help build out the business application and APIs and will be:
Well versed in front and backend JavaScript development
experienced in structuring code experienced managing developers angularjs/reactjs/nodejs/tests optimisation in mind please email your CV to aletha@bitbay.market our Recruitment Manager.
